description: On his own, Kent Larson ventures into the fabled Meat Rack, where he encounters porn superstar Chad Hunt, who returns to the blue screen following a brief hiatus. Now a Lucas Entertainment exclusive, Hunt looks better (and his monster dick looks bigger!) than ever. Larson appreciatively worships Hunts jumbo pole, taking every glorious inch, first in his mouth and then up his ass. This scene percolates with excitement as the dynamic duo work each other into a frenzy. Both deliver amazing pop shots, as they get wild in the woods of Fire Island.
title: Chad Hunt and Kent Larson
